definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: III. [[שׁוק]] (√ of foll.; Ba:ES 46 cp. Ar. 4a0qa attract, impel, of desire, affection, 4awqun desire, but 4 = [[שׁ]] is doubtful; perhaps therefore (cf. Buhl) cp. sa0qa drive, v. I. [[שׁוק]]; or rd. [[תְּשׂוּקָה]]; on NH [[שׁוק]], [[השׁתוקק]], v. Nes:ZAW xxiv (1904), 312 ff.).
